welcome.message: 👋 Welcome! Send me a YouTube link, and I'll summarize it for you. 📹✨

errors.general: 😔 Excuse me. I couldn't help you with it.
errors.rate_limited: ⏱️ Please wait 10 seconds before making another request.
errors.info_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't fetch the information for this video.
errors.transcript_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't fetch the transcript for this video.
errors.summary_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't summarize the transcript.

llm.system_prompt: Convert the provided SRT subtitles into a concise text summary, focusing on key points and omitting timestamps. Maintain the original structure and highlight main ideas under each section.
